milestones.description: Athar Ali Khan and Mohammad Rafique's 137-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 1st wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 76 between Athar Ali Khan and Naimur Rahman
Hitesh Modi and Ravi Shah's 67-run partnership is KENYA's highest for the 5th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 34 between Hitesh Modi and Sandeep Gupta
Mohammad Rafique has broken the record for most runs in boundaries (50) in an innings in ODIs for BAN, going past Athar Ali Khan's 38
Chudasama has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (16) for KENYA, going past Aasif Karim
Athar Ali Khan and Mohammad Rafique's 137-run partnership is BAN's highest for any wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 110 between Akram Khan and Athar Ali Khan
